question: A bicycle, marked at 2000 Rs, is sold with two successive discounts of 20% and 10%. An additional discount of 5% is offered for cash payment, then what would be the selling price at cash payment :
explanation:
Single equivalent discount for two successive discounts of 20% and 10%
$latex = \\left ( 20+10-\\frac{20\\times 10}{100} \\right )\\% = 28\\%&s=1$
Now single discount for 28% and 5%
$latex = \\left ( 28+5-\\frac{28\\times 5}{100} \\right )\\% = \\left ( 33-1.4 \\right )\\% = 31.6\\%&s=1$
âˆ´ Required SP at cash payment = (100 - 31.6)% of 2000 Rs. 
$latex = \\frac{2000\\times 68.4}{100} = 1368\\ Rs.&s=1$
Hence option [A] is correct answer
